title: I  got S- on a game and recieved some sort of message about the mastery 6 token yet I didnt get it
body:
So I have been mastery rank 5 on darius{{champion:122}}  for a couple of days and today I got an S- and some message popped up after the win and it said something about the mastery rank 6 but I quickly closed it because I was sure I got it. but then I checked and darius is still rank 5. why?  (this was on summoners rift normal game btw)

it clearly states that you need an S- or higher to get your token.

replies.body: You'll find that you CAN'T recieve a mastery token in the game that you hit Mastery Level 5 BUT it will tell you that you can start receiving them (which needs to be changed to word it properly) if you get an S-(+)
You can actually, if you hit M5 with an S grade you'll get a token straight away. I can even confirm from personal experience, got a Lux token after her skin came out same game as I got M5.

Unless this is extremely recent, no you can't.

I have hit M5 on multiple champions with S rank games, and never gotten a mastery token for that specific game.

~~It's not recent, it's been that way since M6 and 7 were introduced, ofc I was never sure if it was intended or not. I've always received one under those circumstances, so if you didn't I'd probs submit a support ticket about it.~~

Seems I was indeed mistaken, looks like it was an early bug that got stomped sometime in the interim and I was just mistaken about the Lux game.

It was telling you you have a mastery token, it doesn't level Darius up. To get rank 6 you need to S- or higher mastery 6 tokens and you need to craft them with champion essence in hextech crafting.

Edit: Everyones post including two mods has been downvoted except Valor Carrys (and his post wasn't even answering the question right). Guess you don't want help.
Are you eligible for hex tech crafting? Any recent punishments disallow hex tech rewards and mastery tokens from being obtained.
No, he got the mastery token, he just thinks it gives you level 6 for getting a token cause the window says "Mastery 6 token". He hasn't gone into hextech crafting to craft the tokens.
